mapper.select: SELECT po.opt_no, po.opt_nm, po.actvtn_yn, pov.opt_vl_no, pov.vl_nm, pov.actvtn_yn FROM product_options po LEFT JOIN product_option_values pov ON po.opt_no = pov.opt_no WHERE po.gds_no = #{gdsNo} AND po.actvtn_yn = TRUE;
SELECT pov.opt_vl_no, pov.vl_nm FROM status_option_mappings som INNER JOIN product_option_values pov ON som.opt_vl_no = pov.opt_vl_no WHERE som.gds_stts_no = #{gdsSttsNo} AND pov.actvtn_yn = TRUE;

SELECT pov.opt_vl_no AS opt_vl_no, pov.opt_no AS opt_vl_opt_no, pov.creatr_no AS opt_vl_creatr_no, pov.mdfr_no AS opt_vl_mdfr_no, pov.del_user_no AS opt_vl_del_user_no, pov.vl_nm AS vl_nm, pov.reg_dt AS opt_vl_reg_dt, pov.mdfcn_dt AS opt_vl_mdfcn_dt, pov.inactvtn_dt AS opt_vl_inactvtn_dt, pov.actvtn_yn AS opt_vl_actvtn_yn FROM ks55team02db.product_option_values pov JOIN ks55team02db.product_options po ON pov.opt_no = po.opt_no WHERE po.opt_nm = #{optionTypeName} AND pov.actvtn_yn = TRUE AND po.actvtn_yn = TRUE ORDER BY pov.vl_nm;

SELECT DISTINCT pov.vl_nm FROM ks55team02db.product_option_values pov JOIN ks55team02db.product_options po ON pov.opt_no = po.opt_no WHERE po.opt_nm = #{optionTypeName} AND pov.actvtn_yn = TRUE AND po.actvtn_yn = TRUE ORDER BY pov.vl_nm;
